description:
Rei, a man of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, an elegant and beautiful art with unparalleled brutality.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Suichouken Rei! Tomo no Tame ni Shinda Otoko ga Ita!!
Rei of the South Star Waterfowl Fist! Was a Man Who Died for His Friends!!
南斗水鳥拳レイ! 友のために死んだ男がいた!!
